column4: basicially the theme effect I'm going for is a theme that's digital like the computer screens in Iron Man, if you get what I'm talking about
I did get conky but the styles that are available really arent what I'm looking for, I did get docky for a mac os style dock with a reflection
when I start My Unity it says "Your Ubuntu 12.04 is running in 2D mode. Many features will not be available"
